original_text: When they came to Marah, they could not drink its water because it was bitter. (That is why the place is called Marah.)
korean_text: 마라에 이르렀더니 그 곳 물이 써서 마시지 못하겠으므로 그 이름을 마라라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: they could not drink its water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 물을 마실 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: That is why the place is called Marah
